description: Splits a list into two lists at the frist instance of a specified separator element.

input.name: separator
input.description: The element at which the list is split.

input.name: append
input.description:
Whether to append the separator element to the first list.
Defaults to `False`.

input.name: prepend
input.description:
Whether to prepend the separator element to the second list.
Defaults to `False`.

output.name: first
output.description: A new list containing elements to the before the separator element.

output.name: second
output.description: A new list containing elements to the after the separator element.
